task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 33°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to adjust my view to see the full structure, starting by looking up to capture the roofline.
I need to adjust my position to get a better perspective of the building's height from ground to roof.
I need to adjust my view to look downwards to see the base of the building for a complete height estimation.
With the current view showing both the base and the top of the building, I can now estimate the height accurately.
